subtitle: A quick and easy variation on a traditional bechamel sauce which is simply made by whisking the ingredients together to the boil.

method.text: Place milk, onion, carrot, bay leaf and peppercorns in a pan. Slowly bring to the boil. Then remove from heat. Stand for 30 min. Strain, discarding the vegetables.
Place milk, butter, flour, nutmeg and seasoning in a pan. Heat together, whisking constantly for 3-5 min or until all ingredients are incorporated and the sauce is thickened and cooked.
Remove from heat. Then whisk in the egg yolk, mustard and cheese until melted. Serve immediately. DO NOT reheat the sauce now otherwise it will become very stringy.

title: Cheats cheesy Bechamel sauce
